location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘TRACING SHOWING THE ROUTE AND COAST LINE FROM MOGOO BAY TO THE TOWN OF BUNDER ABBAS’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:303 x 643 mm, on sheet 374 x 710 mm

mods.abstract: Issued with a Report No. 6 of 1864.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings.Map of the area west of Bunder Abbas showing ship’s route with anchorage marked and coordinates reported.Another copy of the map can be found at Mss Eur F126/37, f 23.
